column1: ap 01:02|"one two"|"The years moved across more swiftly
column5: twenty—it became too fast to count. Would they overshoot the fifty?"|"Five Portraits"|"Piers Anthony"

column1: ap 00:57|"three before one"|"Astrid touched her glasses. She could handle trolls
column2: even experienced ones. But it was chancy; she could not be sure of taking out all three before one got to her with a club. They were of course aware that they would take losses. “I hope it can be amicably resolved.”"|"Five Portraits"|"Piers Anthony"
